title: Sentinel-3 Land Surface Reflectance and Aerosol (NTC)
description: This Collection provides the Sentinel-3 Synergy Level-2 Land Surface Reflectance and Aerosol product, which contains data on Surface Directional Reflectance, Aerosol Optical Thickness, and an Angstrom coefficient estimate over land.

bands.name: Oa01
bands.description: Band 1 - Aerosol correction, improved water constituent retrieval

bands.name: Oa02
bands.description: Band 2 - Yellow substance and detrital pigments (turbidity)

bands.name: Oa03
bands.description: Band 3 - Chlorophyll absorption maximum, biogeochemistry, vegetation

bands.name: Oa05
bands.description: Band 5 - Chlorophyll, sediment, turbidity, red tide

bands.name: Oa08
bands.description: Band 8 - 2nd Chlorophyll absorption maximum, sediment, yellow substance / vegetation

bands.name: Oa10
bands.description: Band 10 - Chlorophyll fluorescence peak, red edge

bands.name: Oa11
bands.description: Band 11 - Chlorophyll fluorescence baseline, red edge transition

bands.name: Oa17
bands.description: Band 17 - Atmospheric / aerosol correction, clouds, pixel co-registration

bands.name: Oa18
bands.description: Band 18 - Water vapour absorption reference. Common reference band with SLSTR. Vegetation monitoring

bands.name: Oa19
bands.description: Band 19 - Water vapour absorption, vegetation monitoring (maximum REFLECTANCE)

bands.name: Oa21
bands.description: Band 21 - Water vapour absorption, atmospheric / aerosol correction

bands.name: S1
bands.description: Band 1 - Cloud screening, vegetation monitoring, aerosol

bands.name: S3
bands.description: Band 3 - NDVI, cloud flagging, pixel co-registration

bands.name: S5
bands.description: Band 5 - Cloud clearing, ice, snow, vegetation monitoring

bands.name: S6
bands.description: Band 6 - Vegetation state and cloud clearing

cdse-s3.title: Copernicus Data Space Ecosystem S3
cdse-s3.description: This endpoint will provide access to EO data which is stored on the Object Storage. A Global Service Load Balancer (GSLB) directs the request to either CloudFerro Cloud or OpenTelekom Cloud (OTC) S3 endpoint based on the location of the DNS resolver.

creodias-s3.title: CREODIAS S3
creodias-s3.description: Comprehensive Earth Observation Data (EODATA) archive offered by CREODIAS as a commercial part of CDSE, designed to provide users with access to a vast repository of satellite data without predefined quota limits
